title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Mark Steyn guest hosts for Rush on Monday. Trump listens to Rush, heads to Georgia. Chris Krebs fired for saying rigged election was cleanest in human history. Joe Biden breaks foot playing with dog. Media calls Trump’s claims baseless while hiding fraud stories. Unsuspiciously diminishing Trump votes. Election do-over. Crisis of democracy. The sentimental blather of “count every vote.” Every time a dead person votes, a Democrat gets its wings.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Canadian front operation. What should the Republican response be when all cultural pillars are lost to the left? The American voter is the victim of election impropriety. Wacky Georgia judge’s flip flop on Dominion machines. Fulton County’s Dominion rep was Kamala’s campaign photographer. The weird contrast between the campaign world and the real world. One-third of NJ and NY small businesses permanently closed. Massive transfer of power. Chinese doctor, U.S. resident: China will overtake U.S. sooner thanks to COVID response. Rush has stayed the course for you. No money for cameras at polling places. Czech hunter had rifle stolen by deer.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

This is not a respectable election. Cities with long histories of corruption. Republicans have a duty to make this election the hill to die on. Democrats hate moderate Republicans more than anyone. There’s no future in Paul Ryan Republicanism. Going along with a dishonest election is the new normal. The only reason to reject voter ID is to create voter fraud. Third world countries are laughing at the U.S. election mess. Time to introduce poll scrutineers to the United States lexicon. You could easily and legally perform a do-over election. Don't choke on the lie, live in truth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
